The next subsection outlines the technical steps to prove Theorem 2.

Since I am interested in Markov perfect equilibria, I start by considering the best response
problem of a single agent reacting to a given profile of Markov strategies of the other agents.
That is, suppose that the strategies of all other agents are exogenously fixed at
